title: Lock in
body: Champion select's "Lock In" system is very old and makes it much too easy for ill-intented people, and at this point in the game it feels like a really jerk thing to do, and its usually only those with ill intentions that end up using the button. I am fairly sure the alternative has been mentioned a few times before, but replacing the "Lock In" with "I'm Ready" would allow more freedom in champion select and the ability to still change champion when readied up, and may help to give less sway to those people who tend to instalock.

replies.body:
Teambuilder.
In your suggestion, people will still "instaready" so it doesn't really do much.

Uhhhh no? In ranked at least, it'd be people constantly switching around champs till they get an OP comp or eventually completely counter the other team, if it doesnt become a huge mess before then.

People will find ways to troll, gotta get over it and accept it.
